text:
@realDonaldTrump Except that the mutated version of the coronavirus in NYC came from those non-shithole countries in Europe

Remember when you were ranting & raving yesterday about the NYTimes not quoting their source - that "anonymous source" was the DNA of the European version of the virus. DUH
